  • Constructor Details

    • DungeonCamera

      public DungeonCamera(Entity follows, float vw, float vh)
      Creates a new camera.
      Parameters:
      follows - the entity the camera should follow, null for default coordinates
      vw - virtual width
      vh - virtual height

    • isPointInFrustum

      public boolean isPointInFrustum(float x, float y)
      Checks if the point (x,y) is probably been seen on the screen. Otherwise, don't redender this point.
